channel.title: docker on Silent 代码搬运工
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Silent 代码搬运工

item.title: Docker Compose Port Is Already Allocated
item.description: 1ERROR: for local_nginx Cannot start service nginx: driver failed programming external connectivity on endpoint local_nginx (c3d788a28999dc7888524cd93d63a5dac3da0fe00d9c7d8a09e8bb815005b9f0): Bind for 0.0.0.0:8098 failed: port is already allocated 容器没有运行了，但是端口还在绑定占用 解决： systemctl stop docker.service rm /var/lib/docker/network/files/local-kv.db systemctl restart docker.service
